mapper.select:
select
from room_info where id = #{id} and is_deleted = 0
mapper.insert: insert into room_info (house_id, name, rented_status, rent_people_name, rent_people_phone_number, payor_type, contract_start_time, contract_end_time, creator_name, create_time, updator_name, update_time, is_deleted) values (#{houseId}, #{name}, #{rentedStatus}, #{rentPeopleName}, #{rentPeoplePhoneNumber}, #{payorType}, #{contractStartTime}, #{contractEndTime}, #{creatorName}, #{createTime}, #{updatorName}, #{updateTime},0)
mapper.update:
update room_info
house_id = #{houseId},
name = #{name},
rented_status = #{rentedStatus},
rent_people_name = #{rentPeopleName},
